title: Episode 74: The Age of Toussaint
description:
Haiti was France's richest colony, but Europe's lust for sugar had created a barbaric and unstable social system in the colonies. We meet the man who would one day rise above this barbarism and become father of a new country.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Age of Toussaint
itunes:author: Everett Rummage
itunes:subtitle: Haiti was France's richest colony, but Europe's lust for sugar had created a barbaric and unstable social system in the colonies.
